Info.Title: Stalingrad
Info.Writer: Vasiliy Grossman (book), Sergey Snezhkin (screenplay), Ilya Tilkin (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Mariya Smolnikova, Yanina Studilina, Pyotr Fyodorov, Thomas Kretschmann
Info.Plot: A group of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.
